text: <!channel>: SPARCS SSO Version 2가 거의 개발이 완료되어, 개발 문서 업데이트 뒤 1주일 안으로 베타서버 (<http://ssobeta.sparcs.org|ssobeta.sparcs.org>)에 적용될 예정입니다. ARA Plus, OTL Plus, Zabo 개발팀은 새로 변경된 SPARCS SSO Version 2 Specification과, 업데이트된 라이브러리 (client/sparcsssov2.py) 및 샘플 구현 (client/test.v2.py) 를 참고하여 개발하시기 바랍니다. 추후 베타 서버에 적용될 때 자세한 개발 안내 및 정식 서버 적용 일정과 v1 폐지 일정을 다시 공지하도록 하겠습니다.

attachments.fallback: [sparcs-kaist/sparcssso] Issue created: '#98 update developer document' https://github.com/sparcs-kaist/sparcssso/issues/98 by a1sams1a
attachments.text:
update developer document
• update api specification
• add manual to add/modify/remove test services
attachments.title: #98 update developer document

attachments.fallback: [sparcs-kaist/sparcssso] Pull request submitted: '#99 Add SPARCS SSO Version 2 Core Features' https://github.com/sparcs-kaist/sparcssso/pull/99 by a1sams1a
attachments.text:
refs #76, changes are
• modify model (done #86)
• comment on model (done #87)
• add "dev" app and developer features (done #92, #93, #94)
• implement the core api version 2 (done #95)
• add test web service server (done #97)

unrelated changes are
• edit readme.md (done #91)
• disable GET /account/logout (done #96)
attachments.title: #99 Add SPARCS SSO Version 2 Core Features

attachments.fallback: [sparcs-kaist/sparcssso] Issue created: '#102 add more exception case for /api/v2/logout' https://github.com/sparcs-kaist/sparcssso/issues/102 by a1sams1a
attachments.text:
400: invalid client_id or invalid sign or diff(current_time-timestamp) >= 3
(redirect to service main url): already logged-out or invalid sid; or invalid redirect_url;
attachments.title: #102 add more exception case for /api/v2/logout
